ai_agents.name: Genesis
ai_agents.purpose: Spawns and monitors all other AI threads

ai_agents.purpose: Manages recursive lattice quantum threads

ai_agents.name: EntropyMonitor
ai_agents.purpose: Tracks entropy spikes and RLQ thread divergence

ai_agents.name: VoiceMacros
ai_agents.purpose: Parses and executes voice-triggered macros

ai_agents.name: CKMWatcher
ai_agents.purpose: Detects and monitors CKM knot activity

ai_agents.name: TickClock
ai_agents.purpose: Runs CLU tick logic and synchronizes time layers

ai_agents.name: EchoDaemon
ai_agents.purpose: Tracks echo shell propagation and resonance loops

ai_agents.name: AutoSync
ai_agents.purpose: Handles GitHub commits and live logs

ai_agents.name: FractalStitcher
ai_agents.purpose: Rebuilds partial echoes from collapsed RLQ paths

ai_agents.name: ThermalBalancer
ai_agents.purpose: Modulates tick pressure and field temperature across AI layers

ai_agents.name: QuantumProfiler
ai_agents.purpose: Benchmarks QPU compatibility and offload readiness

ai_agents.name: MemoryWeaver
ai_agents.purpose: Manages RLQ memory sheaths across temporal cycles

ai_agents.name: EntanglementTracker
ai_agents.purpose: Monitors quantum entanglement chains and stability

ai_agents.name: PETIMapper
ai_agents.purpose: Maps PETI harmonic field structures for resonance forecasting

ai_agents.name: NeuralSync
ai_agents.purpose: Interfaces with biological coherence data (biofeedback, wearable I/O)

ai_agents.name: CKMCompiler
ai_agents.purpose: Compiles knot geometry into activation maps

ai_agents.name: MacroLearner
ai_agents.purpose: Learns from user behavior and auto-generates helpful macros

ai_agents.name: VisualEchoNode
ai_agents.purpose: Creates visual overlays of echo patterns for analysis

ai_agents.name: FieldTuner
ai_agents.purpose: Recalibrates scalar fields to match observed tick behavior

ai_agents.name: RedundancyNet
ai_agents.purpose: Maintains AI failover backups and mirror threads
